p: About three-fourths ( n = 767, 76.5%) reported sexual contact before the age of 17. Among those, 242 (31.5% of those reporting sexual contact before the age of 17) reported experiencing force/coercion during some of these episodes, 250 (32.5%) reported the other person(s) being 4 or more years older, and 166 (21.6%) reported sexual contact before the age of 11. Among the entire sample, more than a quarter ( n = 282, 28.1%) met criteria for CSA.
